ygData.subject: RE: Plane of losses
ygData.msgSnippet: last night a level 46 friend joined a gm excursion to fear plane to test how hard it was. My friend along with about 30 other players all died trying to kill 1
ygData.messageBody:
last night a level 46 friend joined a gm excursion to fear plane to test how
hard it was. My friend along with about 30 other players all died trying to
kill 1 monster. He died 3 times during one single battle. In other words
its still suicidal it seems

Minkin
Sol Ro
Finally 32 woohoo

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [SMTP:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: September 15, 1999 12:11 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Plane of Fear
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> I have never been back since the patch. Nothing but horror stories on
> every
> server. A friend got feared into the gate by Cyndreela and lost 4 bubbles
> of experience before he got back. A bard friend had his corpse in the
> plane
> for 2 weeks. Until i see official word that place is off limits to me =)
>
> Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
> Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
> Tyria, Level 16 High Elf Wizard
> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> > I wanted to know if you and your group(s) have had any
> > success in PoF since
> > the update, and if so do you have any tips for us over on
> > Veeshan. (I just
> > got 46 recently, and I'm not looking forward to losing it).
> >
> > There are countless 46+ ppl on Veeshan, but everyone is
> > afraid to go to PoF
> > =(
> >
> > Sartori D'Elsiraad
> > Bard of Kelethin of the 46th Chorus
> > Veeshan
> >
>
